Name: Circle Empires Tactics
About the game: Experience Circle Empires like never before! Use your instincts to predict and counter your enemies’ movements in this turn-based tactics game. See your orders unfold in victory or utter defeat in short, intense battles! Upgrade your units with powerful magical tokens, then create crazy combinations and overcome impossible odds. Play as the leader of the oppressive Human Empire, the brutal Lizard-Orc alliance or the cunning Wizards of light and darkness. Each faction has its own unique playstyle, from vicious wolf riders to snakes the size of buses — play to your strengths and emerge victorious! Prediction is the name of the game in Circle Empires Tactics. Play with your friends in co-op, or prove your superiority in PvP. Because turns are simultaneous, you’ll have to predict your opponent’s moves and plan accordingly. Journey through vast and dangerous lands to defeat your enemies in single player. Gain reputation with Demigods by completing quests, then use your friendship to gain a variety of boons. Don’t want to deal with a certain Demigod? You could always turn on them… if your army is powerful enough. A good tactician masters the battlefield. Create maps with your own unique flavor in our powerful map editing tool. Place creatures, resources and obstacles, then take to the field in PvP or Co-Op. Share your creations with others, and download maps that catch your eye through the Steam Workshop.
